Text:
I searched for a way to disable the Cinivia in your PS3. None of the answers really worked for me. They were to play the movie at a speed ratio of 1.5 e.t.c 
I recommend just downloading DVDRIP movies instead of BRRIP, It aint that hard to find them. 
Lastly, if someone bitches that they need to download in high def just pay for the movie then. If your really that picky, you won't be happy with anything on any torrent sites and their just not for you.
